original_title: Errol Spence Jr. vs. Danny Garcia
overview: Errol Spence Jr. makes his long-awaited return to the boxing ring on Saturday evening for the first time since his horrific car accident in October 2019. Spence is set to defend his WBC and IBF welterweight world titles against former two-division champ Danny Garcia in a Fox pay-per-view main event.
title: Errol Spence Jr. vs. Danny Garcia
